verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:24
verses.text: Then cometh the end, when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God, even the Father; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:25
verses.text: For he must reign, till he hath put all enemies under his feet.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:26
verses.text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:27
verses.text: For he hath put all things under his feet. But when he saith all things are put under him, it is manifest that he is excepted, which did put all things under him.
